cell.name: A1
cell.simple-value: 项目组质量扫描和全量自动化测试

dataset.name: distribution_statistics
dataset.sql:
SELECT title as '主题', CASE batch_status WHEN 0 THEN '尚未执行' WHEN 1 THEN '取消' WHEN 2 THEN '成功' WHEN 3 THEN '进行中' WHEN 4 THEN '暂停（等待输入指令）' WHEN 5 THEN '失败' WHEN 6 THEN '成功(不稳定)' WHEN 7 THEN '上线中' ELSE '未知' END '审批转态', batch_user_name as '审批人', release_user_name as '审批负责人', create_date as '创建时间',
CASE release_status WHEN 0 THEN '尚未执行' WHEN 1 THEN '取消' WHEN 2 THEN '成功' WHEN 3 THEN '进行中' WHEN 4 THEN '暂停（等待输入指令）' WHEN 5 THEN '失败' WHEN 6 THEN '成功(不稳定)' WHEN 7 THEN '上线中' ELSE '未知' END '上线状态' FROM ci_online where team_id =1 order by create_date desc

dataset.name: quality_scanning-full_automatic_testing
dataset.sql:
SELECT '尚未执行' AS NAME, ( SELECT count(status) FROM ci_pipeline_history WHERE project_id in ( SELECT id FROM ci_project cp WHERE team_id =( SELECT id FROM ci_team ct where name = 'devops')) and profile_id=(select id from ci_pipeline_profile cpp WHERE name="质量扫描和全量自动化测试") AND profile_name is not NULL AND LENGTH(profile_name)>0 and status = 0 ) AS "value" UNION ALL SELECT '取消' AS NAME, ( SELECT count(status) FROM ci_pipeline_history WHERE project_id in ( SELECT id FROM ci_project cp WHERE team_id =( SELECT id FROM ci_team ct where name = 'devops')) and profile_id=(select id from ci_pipeline_profile cpp WHERE name="质量扫描和全量自动化测试") AND profile_name is not NULL AND LENGTH(profile_name)>0 and status = 1 ) AS "value" UNION ALL SELECT '成功' AS NAME, ( SELECT count(status) FROM ci_pipeline_history WHERE project_id in ( SELECT id FROM ci_project cp WHERE team_id =( SELECT id FROM ci_team ct where name = 'devops')) and profile_id=(select id from ci_pipeline_profile cpp WHERE name="质量扫描和全量自动化测试") AND profile_name is not NULL AND LENGTH(profile_name)>0 and status = 2 ) AS "value" UNION ALL SELECT '进行中' AS NAME, ( SELECT count(status) FROM ci_pipeline_history WHERE project_id in ( SELECT id FROM ci_project cp WHERE team_id =( SELECT id FROM ci_team ct where name = 'devops')) and profile_id=(select id from ci_pipeline_profile cpp WHERE name="质量扫描和全量自动化测试") AND profile_name is not NULL AND LENGTH(profile_name)>0 and status = 3 ) AS "value" UNION ALL SELECT '暂停（等待输入指令）' AS NAME, ( SELECT count(status) FROM ci_pipeline_history WHERE project_id in ( SELECT id FROM ci_project cp WHERE team_id =( SELECT id FROM ci_team ct where name = 'devops')) and profile_id=(select id from ci_pipeline_profile cpp WHERE name="质量扫描和全量自动化测试") AND profile_name is not NULL AND LENGTH(profile_name)>0 and status = 4 ) AS "value" UNION ALL SELECT '失败' AS NAME, ( SELECT count(status) FROM ci_pipeline_history WHERE project_id in ( SELECT id FROM ci_project cp WHERE team_id =( SELECT id FROM ci_team ct where name = 'devops')) and profile_id=(select id from ci_pipeline_profile cpp WHERE name="质量扫描和全量自动化测试") AND profile_name is not NULL AND LENGTH(profile_name)>0 and status = 5 ) AS "value" UNION ALL SELECT '成功(不稳定)' AS NAME, ( SELECT count(status) FROM ci_pipeline_history WHERE project_id in ( SELECT id FROM ci_project cp WHERE team_id =( SELECT id FROM ci_team ct where name = 'devops')) and profile_id=(select id from ci_pipeline_profile cpp WHERE name="质量扫描和全量自动化测试") AND LENGTH(profile_name)>0 and status = 6 ) AS "value"
UNION ALL SELECT '上线中' AS NAME, ( SELECT count(status) FROM ci_pipeline_history WHERE project_id in ( SELECT id FROM ci_project cp WHERE team_id =( SELECT id FROM ci_team ct where name = 'devops')) and profile_id=(select id from ci_pipeline_profile cpp WHERE name="质量扫描和全量自动化测试") AND LENGTH(profile_name)>0 and status = 7 ) AS "value"
